■ NTT 東日本
取得方法
telnet 2404:1a8:c023:3201::15 49881
GET /v6/route-info HTTP/1.1
Host:route-info.flets-east.jp
Accept:*/*
Accept-Charset:Shift_JIS
Connection:close

結果を以下に貼り付けてコメントを書くこと

0000,2020/09/17 09:23:31
1111,2404:01a8:7e00:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/40 # EAST_PPPOE
1211,2404:01a8:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/32 # EAST_IPOE_SNI_SERVERS
1212,2001:0c90:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/33 # EAST_BFLETS
1311,2408:0210:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_IPOE_UNI
1411,2400:2410:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_BBIX
1412,2409:0010:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_MFEED
1413,240b:0010:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_JPNE
1414,2404:7a80:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_BIGLOBE
1415,2405:6580:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_ASAHINET
1416,2400:4050:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_NTTCOM
1417,2401:4d40:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_FAMILYNET
1418,2001:0f70:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_ARTERIA
1419,240b:c0c4:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # EAST_RAKUTEN_MOBILE

■ NTT 西日本
取得方法

telnet 2001:a7ff:ff22:3::10 49881
GET /v6/route-info HTTP/1.1
Host:route-info.flets-west.jp
Accept:*/*
Accept-Charset:Shift_JIS
Connection:close

結果を以下に貼り付けてコメントを書くこと

2111,2001:a7ff:5e00:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/40 # WEST_PPPOE
2211,2001:a7ff:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/32 # WEST_IPOE_SNI_SERVERS
2212,2001:a000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/24 # WEST_IPOE_UNI
2311,2001:a200:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/23 # WEST_IPOE_UNI
2411,2400:2650:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_BBIX
2412,2409:0250:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_MFEED
2413,240b:0250:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_JPNE
2414,2404:7a84:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_BIGLOBE
2415,2405:6584:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_ASAHINET
2416,2400:4150:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_NTTCOM
2417,2401:4d44:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_FAMILYNET
2418,2001:0f74:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_ARTERIA
2419,240b:c0cc:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000/30 # WEST_RAKUTEN_MOBILE
